Package gr.interamerican.bo2.utils.greek

Class Summary
GreekLetters Utility for Greek letters.
GreekUtils Utilities for the Greek Language.
RemoveToneSigns Removes tone signs from Greek letters.
Transcription743 Transcripts Greek names to Latin according to the ELOT 743 standard.
VisuallySimilarLatin Associates a Greek character to its Latin visually similar.
